questions.question: This arc sees the Straw Hat Pirates in a struggle against a corrupt government agency on an island known for its judicial powers. What is...?
Taking place on a ship graveyard, this arc introduces the character of Brook and the concept of the Florian Triangle. What is...?
This arc features the Straw Hat Pirates' encounter with a group of powerful fish-men and a former Warlord of the Sea. What is...?
This advanced form of Armament Haki allows the user to emit their Haki beyond their body to attack the inside of an object. What is...?
This ability, showcased by a Straw Hat crew member, grants the power to manipulate and become sand. What is...?
This Devil Fruit ability allows the user to control, produce, and become mochi. What is...?
This princess of the Alabasta Kingdom travels with the Straw Hat Pirates and wields the power of the Flower-Flower Fruit. Who is...?
This character, known for their skeletal appearance and musical talents, is the musician of the Straw Hat Pirates. Who is...?
This character, a member of the Straw Hat Pirates and a skilled archaeologist, is known for her ability to read Poneglyphs. Who is...?
